name: Ringzer0team
description: RingZer0 Team's online CTF offers you tons of challenges designed to test and improve your hacking skills through hacking challenges. Register and get a flag for every challenge.
Currently more than 200 challenges are available over 13 categories. Have fun resolving them.

name: Root Me
description: Root Me allows everyone to test and improve their knowledge in computer security and hacking. Legal. Free. Realistic.
Hundreds of challenges are available to train yourself in different and not simulated environments, offering you a way to learn a lot of hacking technics!
